summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SaaS landing pages. All 11 features tested and passed. Homepage, Features, Pricing, and About pages all load correctly with proper navigation, visual elements, and user interactions.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with data-testid='landing-page'
Hero section displays with warranty search form
Hero heading contains 'Track Every Asset' and 'Never Miss a Warranty'
Warranty search input (data-testid='warranty-search-input') found and functional
Warranty search button (data-testid='warranty-search-btn') found and functional
Hero CTA primary button shows 'Start Free Trial'
Features section displays 6 feature cards
How It Works section shows 3 steps (Sign Up, Import Assets, Start Tracking)
Pricing section shows 4 plans (Free Trial, Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
CTA section at bottom with 'Start Free Trial' and 'Talk to Sales' buttons
Navigation links work: Features, Pricing, Sign In, Get Started
Features page (/features) loads with 'Powerful features for modern IT teams' heading
Pricing page (/pricing) loads with billing toggle (Monthly/Yearly)
Pricing page shows 'Save 17%' badge for yearly billing
Pricing page has 'Most Popular' badge on Professional plan
Pricing page has Feature comparison table
Pricing page has FAQs section
About page (/about) loads with 'Making IT asset management simple' heading
About page shows stats (Founded 2024, 10,000+ Assets, 500+ Organizations, 99.9% Uptime)
About page has Our Story and Our Values sections
About page shows 4 values (Mission-Driven, Transparency, Customer First, Quality)
Mobile menu button visible on narrow screens
Mobile menu opens/closes on click
Mobile menu contains Features, Pricing, Sign In links
Footer has Product, Company, Legal sections with navigation links
Support Portal page loads at /support
Company Login page loads at /company/login
Signup page loads at /signup
Warranty search form validation works (shows error for empty input)
Warranty search navigates to /warranty/{serialNumber} on valid input

design_review.contrast: Good - White text on dark backgrounds, dark text on light backgrounds
design_review.spacing: Good - Consistent padding and margins throughout
design_review.typography: Good - Clear hierarchy with font-display for headings
design_review.color_scheme: Good - Blue (#0F62FE) primary, slate grays for text
design_review.responsive: Good - Mobile menu works correctly on narrow screens

context_for_next_testing_agent: SaaS landing pages are fully functional. All public pages (/, /features, /pricing, /about) load correctly. Navigation works between all pages. Mobile menu is responsive. Warranty search form validates input and navigates to /warranty/{serialNumber}. Key data-testids: landing-page, hero-section, features-section, pricing-section, how-it-works-section, cta-section, warranty-search-input, warranty-search-btn, nav-features, nav-pricing, nav-login, nav-get-started, mobile-menu-btn, mobile-menu.
